original_text: And the priest shall put some of the blood on the horns of the altar of fragrant incense before the Lord that is in the tent of meeting, and all the rest of the blood of the bull he shall pour out at the base of the altar of burnt offering that is at the entrance of the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 제사장은 또 그 피를 여호와 앞 곧 회막 안 향단 뿔들에 바르고 그 송아지의 피 전부를 회막 문 앞 번제단 밑에 쏟을 것이며

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall put some of the blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그 피의 일부를 바를 것인데

sentences.original_text: on the horns of the altar of fragrant incense
that is in the tent of meeting
and all the rest of the blood of the bull
at the base of the altar of burnt offering
that is at the entrance of the tent of meeting
